layer at (0,0) size 800x50

      LayoutInline {a} at (0,0) size 387x18 [color=#000080]

          text run at (0,0) width 44: "Hover "

            text run at (43,0) width 32: "here"

          text run at (74,0) width 152: " and the background of "
